alert.note: Alert for Meade; Pennington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued March 05 at 9:44PM MST until March 05 at 10:30PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Snow Squall Warning for... South central Meade County in west central South Dakota... Southeastern Pennington County in west central South Dakota... * Until 1030 PM MST. * At 943 PM MST, a dangerous snow squall was located along a line extending from 6 miles southeast of Elm Springs to 7 miles northwest of Scenic, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Poor visibility in heavy snow. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. * This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 91 and 111. Locations impacted include... Wall, Wasta, Owanka, Wicksville and northern Badlands National Park. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Slow Down! Rapid changes in visibility and road conditions are expected with this dangerous snow squall. Be alert for sudden whiteout conditions.
